law.catch_line: Report of FAIR plan commercial real property policy applicants' names to state fire marshal.
law.text: The commissioner shall request, receive and transmit the names and addresses of all commercial real property policy applicants to the "FAIR" plan to the state fire marshal.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1463, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 314, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 305, sec. 24, effective June 17, 1978.
